channel.title: The legend of korra?
channel.description:
Hey, I just watched the new episode of korra (The new avatar Series) and i would like some opinions.
My opinion is, Its so soft, the bending games are fun, but i miss those epic avatar glowing state (in 10 episodes not 1 time!)
Also it isnt anymore about the 4 nations but more abount non benders and benders that makes it less fun to and what i hate most everything is going on in 1 city, with cars bikes and phones.
And what i hate most that the fucking nonbenders are even stronger then the benders.
Personaly i think they moved backwards with this serie. What do you guys think?

item.title: The legend of korra?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:128, topic:445430”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=548208.msg4097129#msg4097129 date=1346982320]

Lol my friends are just starting with watching korra (It just got released on TV here in holland).
I saw it from the very beginning in America.
Cant wait till the new season cuz now she masters her avatar state!
so damn epic, going in and out the state whenever you want.

Its gona be epic, cant wait for it!

Someone knows when its getting released??

Avatar State is nothing compared to Super Saiyans.
[/quote]Blood bending > anything[/quote]
Majin buu doesn’t have blood, he’ll rip them apart.

Read full topic

item.title: The legend of korra?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Season 2 Confirmed (officially)

TV.com

News Briefs: Science Announces a Firefly Reunion Special

Plus: Nickelodeon renews The Legend of Korra, Mindy Kaling adds to her cast, and the NCIS cast is sticking around.

The Legend of Korra will see the light of a second season, says Nickelodeon. The network has officially picked up the animated series for a second round after phenomenal ratings in Season 1. There will be 26 episodes, which will reportedly be broken into two 13-episode segments. You go, Korra! [EW]

Read full topic

item.title: The legend of korra?
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

I thought i was the only one that watched this series on the site. Glad im not the only one.
Season ones ending was epic. Amon is going down on my list of all time favorite antagonist. It was so ironic that he was a blood bender. But too me the season ending felt like a series ending. I fell like they could have saved somethings for season two. Like her romance with Mako, or Beifong getting her bending back. All and all it was great, but i bet its going to be awkward if Asami stays with the group and her watching Mako and Korra. It will be the same for Bolin but im sure he will get over it quickly.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:111, topic:445430”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=548208.msg4028515#msg4028515 date=1340543304]

Dear God… where is all the information to this Mista?
[/quote]Is there a problem?

Nope. Would just like to keep up-to-date.[/quote]Oh, sorry, I misunderstood your question, as to where the information to this is, I knew there were going to be 2 seasons since the first episode and here are two recent interviews with the creators that will give you more informaton about the series.

Here this blog interviews the creators a day or two before the finale aired:
19/06 - http://blogs.wsj.com/speakeasy/2012/06/19/the-legend-of-korra-creators-preview-the-finale/

And here the creators answer questions of fans:
22/06 - http://blogs.wsj.com/speakeasy/2012/06/22/the-legend-of-korra-creators-answer-your-questions/

Read full topic
